TableContextTimeStampAfterTable: {7422=In February Mark Bittman - NYTimes, Minimalist featured this recipe: http://www.nytimes.com/2010/03/03/dining/03mini.html?ref=dining I have prepared it several times, quite like it, and think that it is going to be part of my rotation. Might not be 'authentic' as Bittman freely admits.}
